* : Command mode
* Esc Return to normal mode
* gi first editable item
* i last editable item
* ctrl-q quit
* o Search
* O Search with current URI
* t Opens "tab"
* T Open "tab" with url
* gh Go to home
* gH Go to home in new window
* u Open last closed
* U Open last closed In new window
* #ctrl-o backwards in history
* #ctrl-i forwards in history
* r reload
* R reload without cache

* Movement
* Vim keys
* #ctrl-f n pages down
* #ctrl-b n pages up
* #ctrl-d n half pages down
* #ctrl-u n half pages up
* gg top
* G bottom
* 0 Left of doc
* $ Right of doc

* Hinting
* Used so select things
* f Open selected item ;o
* F Open selected item in new window ;t
* ;i Hint image
* ;i Hint image new window
* ;s Save
* ;y Yank url
* ;Y yank description

* Zoom
* #zi zoom text in
* #zo zoom text out
* #zI full page zoom in
* #zO full page zoom out
* zz reset

* Bookmarks
* :bma tag adds
* :bmr remove
* !tag

* Configuration
* ~/.config/vimb/config

* Tabbing
	* Use tabbed

* Styling

* Installation
	* Standard repos on Arch
